data.value: Kein Untertitel erkannt umzu exportieren. Gehen Sie zu Schritt 1 und ändern Sie Untertitel-Track.

data.name: Message_TheresNoSubtitleToLoad
data.value: Es gibt kein Untertitel zu laden!

data.name: Message_TheSplitTimeMustBeLargerThanTheOriginalSubtitlesStartTime
data.value: Die Trennung-Zeit muss großer als die orginale Untertiel-Start-Zeit

data.name: Message_TheSplitTimeMustBeSmallerThanTheOriginalSubtitlesEndTime
data.value: Die Trennung-Zeit muss großer als die originale Untertiel-End-Zeit

data.name: Message_ThisMp3FileDoesntHaveID3v2
data.value: Diese mp3-Datei hat kein ID3v2. Das Programm wird ID3v2.3-Tag bei der Speicherung erstellen.

data.name: Message_ThisNameAlreadyTaken
data.value: Dieser Name ist bereits vorhanden.

data.name: Message_UnableToOpenMKV
data.value: Nicht in der Lage, die Matroska-Datei zu laden. Diese Datei ist keine Matroka Datei oder hat keine Untertitel-Track.

data.name: Message_UnableToRipThisTrackEncryptedVobsubContentNotSupported
data.value: Nicht in der Lage, diesen Track auszukopieren. Verschlüsselte Vobsub-Inhalt ist nicht unterstützt

data.name: NewSubtitlesTrack
data.value: Neues Untertitel-Track

data.name: SubtitlesTrack
data.value: Untertitel-Track

data.name: TipOfTheDay_0
data.value: You can duplicate subtitles track's subtitles to another new one, just select the desired language track then CTRL+D or right-mouse click then select duplicate.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_1
data.value: If your mp3 file has a ID3 Synchronized Lyric, add it to your project !!, Go to Tools>Extract from ID3 Or Control+Alt+Q.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_10
data.value: It's a long movie you work with here and it's hard to seek to chapters. You use the marks to seek media time easily, go to Player>Marks.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_11
data.value: Use the GT-Text file to translate huge count of subtitles, it's x 2 faster than usual translate opeation.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_12
data.value: You don't have time to synchronise subtitle timings using the timeline control ? then use the AHD Synchronisation Tool, it can do the hard works in seconds !!?

data.name: TipOfTheDay_13
data.value: Don't you know ? AHD Subtitles format file can save all subtitle tracks of your project ? also saves styles (colors, fonts..) for each char of each subtitles ? A backup of your project can be created using this format.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_2
data.value: When you import a subtitle format, it may includes wrong subtitle(s). you can check subtitles error by going to Tools>Check subtitles errors Or Control+Alt+C.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_3
data.value: You can change the media any time you want, press CTRL + M

data.name: TipOfTheDay_4
data.value: You can set current time as the end time for the subtitle at the player time, just click 'Set current time as subtitle's end time' button in the player controls.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_5
data.value: Do you know that ASM auto check for subtitle errors for imported subtitles format ? aslo you can change this option via settings>general

data.name: TipOfTheDay_6
data.value: No need to manual synchronise, use the timeline control to adjust subtitle timings !!

data.name: TipOfTheDay_7
data.value: If you want to convert subtitles format,no need to run AHd Subtitles Maker Professional at all !! it's better to use AHD Subtitles Converter istead.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_8
data.value: You need to translate subtitles but you don't have enough time to write texts ? you can use the google translate service instead.

data.name: TipOfTheDay_9
data.value: You Don't like the look of AHD Subtiltes Maker Professional and you see the layout is confused ? you can change the layout and more, go to View>Layout

data.name: TipOfTheDay_14
data.value: Search and download subtitles for your movie directly from OpenSubtitles.org anytime without leaving ASM ! Go to Tools>Download subtitles from OpenSubtitles.org

data.name: TipOfTheDay_15
data.value: Share your subtitles now and upload them directly to OpenSubtitles.org. Go to Tools>Upload subtitles to OpenSubtitles.org
